#Ho/Calculate heterozygosity per site (a higher proportion of heterozygous individuals at a particular locus can indicate greater genetic diversity.)
```{r}
basic_Btrout = basic.stats(Brown.Trout, diploid = TRUE)
Ho_Btrout = apply(basic_Btrout$Ho, MARGIN = 2, FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE) %>%  round(digits = 2)
Ho_Btrout
```

#He/Mean expected heterozygosity per site
```{r}
He_Btrout = apply(basic_Btrout$Hs, MARGIN = 2, FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE) %>%
  round(digits = 2)
He_Btrout
```

```{r}
# 1- Assuming 'sites_order' contains the desired order of sites
sites_order <- c ("Heikkisenjoki_Background_C" , "Heikkisenjoki_Background_R","Heikkisenjoki_Recovery_C", "Heikkisenjoki_Recovery_R", "Heikkisenjoki_Contemporary_C", "Heikkisenjoki_Contemporary_R", "KALL_Background_C", "KALL_Background_R", "KALL_Recovery_C", "KALL_Recovery_R", "KALL_Contemporary_C", "KALL_Contemporary_R", "Savijoki_Background_C", "Savijoki_Background_R", "Savijoki_Recovery_C", "Savijoki_Recovery_R", "Savijoki_Contemporary_C", "Savijoki_Contemporary_R", "Siltapuro_Background_C", "Siltapuro_Background_R", "Siltapuro_Recovery_C", "Siltapuro_Recovery_R", "Siltapuro_Contemporary_C", "Siltapuro_Contemporary_R")

# 1. Assign levels to 'Site'
Het_Btrout_df$Site <- factor(Het_Btrout_df$Site, levels = sites_order)
# 2. Create a new data frame with reshaped data
Het_Btrout_long <- data.frame(Site = names(Ho_Btrout), Ho = Ho_Btrout) %>%
  melt(id.vars = "Site", na.rm = TRUE)

# 3. Add a 'color' column
Het_Btrout_long$color <- ifelse(substr(Het_Btrout_long$Site, nchar(as.character(Het_Btrout_long$Site)), nchar(as.character(Het_Btrout_long$Site))) == "C", "blue", "red")
custom_theme = theme(
  axis.text.x = element_text(size = 7, angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
  axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
  axis.title.y = element_text(size = 11),
  axis.title.x = element_blank(),
  axis.line.y = element_line(size = 0.5),
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  legend.text = element_text(size = 10),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.background = element_blank(),
  plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, size = 12, face="bold")
  )
hetlab.o = expression(italic("H")[o])
hetlab.e = expression(italic("H")[e])

p <- ggplot(data = Het_Btrout_df, aes(x = Site, y = value, fill = color)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "identity") +  
  scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0, 0), limits = c(0, 0.75), breaks = seq(0, 0.6, by = 0.1)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("blue", "#bdbdbd"), labels = c("Control","Treatment")) +
  ylab("Value") +
  ggtitle("Observed Heterozygosity") + 
  custom_theme +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1, vjust = 1))  # Adjust vjust value
p
```
